mapper.select: select product_no, product_img,product_name,product_price from product_tbl where product_no = #{productNo}
mapper.insert: insert into cart_item_tbl (cart_no, cup_choice, cup_size, cup_shot, cup_cream, count, product_no, member_no, shop_name) values (cart_item_tbl_seq.nextval, #{cupChoice}, #{cupSize}, #{cupShot}, #{cupCream}, #{count}, #{productNo}, #{memberNo}, #{shopName})
